## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.logs or debug code
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run linters and fixed all issues

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if frontend change)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions/components
- [ ] I have updated API documentation (if endpoints changed)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked for dependency conflicts
- [ ] All new dependencies are necessary and justified
- [ ] I have updated package.json/requirements.txt appropriately

### Database
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if schema changed)
- [ ] Seed data is updated (if needed)
- [ ] Backward compatibility is maintained

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords) is exposed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented
- [ ] Authentication/authorization is properly handled
- [ ] XSS and SQL injection are prevented
